column4: Can someone please help me make sense of my Grub install problem
I got a virus on my Windows XP partition (big surprise), so I re-installed XP fresh.  Unfortunately it overwrote the MBR with GRUB and now I can't get to my Ubuntu.
Trying the grub-install thing except with the live cd booted up, it doesn't recognize "hd(0,0)" or (/dev/sda) for a target.
i think its hd(0) for the first target
